name: Bat and Bot
description:
You've just built a robot, but itss navigation module is malfunctioning! Now it can only travel in the direction it's facing. However, there is a solution. As we all know, when technology isn't working properly, you hit it with a baseball bat! When you hit the robot, it will face the way you are facing.  Using your bat, help your robot reach the end of each level safely.

Controls: 

WASD or Arrows: Move

Space: Swing bat
